En.MACHAMP_PA1_TEXT_1: Increases Attack by 10% for 5s when afflicted by any debuff.
En.MACHAMP_BA1_TEXT_1: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits. This boosted attack also decreases the movement speed of enemies by 50% for 1s.
En.MACHAMP_MOVE_KARATE_CHOP_TEXT_1: Machamp attacks in a straight line dealing damage to enemies hit.
En.MACHAMP_MOVE_CLOSE_COMBAT_TEXT_1: Machamp unleashes a barrage of blows in a targeted direction for 1s, hitting multiple times and finishing with a single large strike. Machamp is unstoppable for the duration and can move while using Close Combat.
En.MACHAMP_MOVE_CLOSE_COMBAT_TEXT_2: Deals 25% additional damage if the target is affected by a status condition.
En.MACHAMP_MOVE_CROSS_CHOP_TEXT_1: Machamp dashes forward, dealing damage to enemies hit. Cross Chop may critically hit and has a 5% higher Critical-Hit Rate. Cross Chop further increases Critical-Hit Rate by 5% for 3s on hit.
En.MACHAMP_MOVE_CROSS_CHOP_TEXT_2: Machamp’s auto attacks increases Atk by 2 per target hit, permanently stacking up to 40 times.
En.MACHAMP_MOVE_BULK_UP_TEXT_1: Machop buffs themselves for 3s becoming unstoppable, increasing attack by 15%, attack speed by 40% and movement speed by 30% inititally, diminishing gradually every 1s. Machop's next attack is boosted.
En.MACHAMP_MOVE_DYNAMIC_PUNCH_TEXT_1: Machamp jumps to target location, becoming unstoppable for 0.5s, stunning enemies hit for 0.5s, slowing them by 40% for 3s, and dealing damage four times in quick succession to the landing radius. Machamp’s Atk is increased by 15% for 5s and gains bonus movement speed of 40% inititally, diminishing gradually, for 3s when using Dynamic Punch. Machamp’s next auto attack is boosted.
En.MACHAMP_MOVE_DYNAMIC_PUNCH_TEXT_2: Further increases movement speed by 30% and Atk bonus by 5%.
En.MACHAMP_MOVE_SUBMISSION_TEXT_1: Machamp becomes unstoppable for 5s and gains 50% increased movement speed (diminishing every 1s by 20%) or until the next auto attack. Machamp’s next auto attack during submission is enhanced, hitting twice and slamming the target down behind Machamp. If this attack hits, Machamp also gains 5% increased Critical-Hit Rate and 50% Attack Speed for 3s.
En.MACHAMP_MOVE_SUBMISSION_TEXT_2: Further increases Critical-Hit Rate by 5% and Attack Speed by 10%.
En.MACHAMP_MOVE_BARRAGE_BLOW_TEXT_1: Increases Machamp's movement speed by 5%, Attack by 30%, Defense by 200, and Sp. Defense by 200 for 10s. If used again, unleash a combo attack, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and shoving them. The final blow deals double the damage of the previous hits.
En.MACHAMP_MOVE_BARRAGE_BLOW_TEXT_2: 30% Movement Speed, 35% Attack Speed, 20% Max HP Shield

Cn.MACHAMP_PA1_TEXT_1: 受到任何负面效果影响时，攻击力提高 10%，持续 5 秒。
Cn.MACHAMP_BA1_TEXT_1: 第三次普通攻击为强化普通攻击，命中时增加伤害，并降低对方宝可梦的移动速度 50%，持续 1 秒。
Cn.MACHAMP_MOVE_KARATE_CHOP_TEXT_1: 用锋利的手刀进行劈斩攻击。
Cn.MACHAMP_MOVE_CLOSE_COMBAT_TEXT_1: 在 1 秒内，朝指定方向连续挥拳，最后一击将造成更高伤害。招式期间自身可以移动，并且不会被妨碍。
Cn.MACHAMP_MOVE_CLOSE_COMBAT_TEXT_2: 如果目标受到状态条件的影响，则造成 25% 的额外伤害。
Cn.MACHAMP_MOVE_CROSS_CHOP_TEXT_1: 用两手呈十字向前冲锋的同时进行劈打攻击。十字劈能够暴击，并且比正常暴击率高 5%。同时，会提高暴击率 5%，持续 3 秒。
Cn.MACHAMP_MOVE_CROSS_CHOP_TEXT_2: 每次普通攻击击中一个目标都会增加 2 点自身攻击力，最多可永久性叠加 40 次。
Cn.MACHAMP_MOVE_BULK_UP_TEXT_1: 使用招式后，在 3 秒内不会被妨碍，并且提高自身 30% 移动速度和 40% 攻击，每 1 秒会衰减。普通攻击会也变得更快。另外，下一次普通攻击将变为强化普通攻击。
Cn.MACHAMP_MOVE_DYNAMIC_PUNCH_TEXT_1: 跳跃到指定位置，0.5 秒内自身不会被妨碍，使对方宝可梦在 0.5 秒内无法动弹，并在 3 秒内减速 40%， 对落地区域造成 4 次伤害。攻击在 5 秒内提高 15%，获得额外的 40% 初始移动速度，3 秒内逐渐衰减。另外，下一次普通攻击将变为强化普通攻击。
Cn.MACHAMP_MOVE_DYNAMIC_PUNCH_TEXT_2: 进一步增加 30% 的移动速度和 5% 的额外攻击。
Cn.MACHAMP_MOVE_SUBMISSION_TEXT_1: 提高自身的移动速度 50%（每 1 秒减少 20%，或直到下次普通攻击），并且 5 秒内不会被妨碍。下一次普通攻击命中时将增加伤害，把对方宝可梦摔向身后并让其无法动弹。招式结束后，在 3 秒内提高自身的暴击率 5%，且普通攻击速度提高 50%。
Cn.MACHAMP_MOVE_SUBMISSION_TEXT_2: 暴击率进一步提高 5%，攻击速度额外提高 10%。
Cn.MACHAMP_MOVE_BARRAGE_BLOW_TEXT_1: 在 10 秒内提高自身的移动速度 5%、攻击 30%、防御 200、特防 200。再次使用招式时，将发动连续攻击，持续造成范围伤害，并击退对方宝可梦，最后一击将造成两倍伤害。
Cn.MACHAMP_MOVE_BARRAGE_BLOW_TEXT_2: 30% 移动速度，35% 攻击速度，20% 最大体力的护盾
